body:
```bash
$ spack test run superlu
==> Spack test a3ovgo5kf4aqeurc3gvruduoiwot63qf
==> Testing package superlu-5.3.0-glyckr7
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' 'superlu'

2 errors found in test log:
  >> 5    superlu.c:21:10: fatal error: slu_ddefs.h: No such file or directory
     6       21 | #include "slu_ddefs.h"
     7          |          ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
     8    compilation terminated.
  >> 9    make: *** [Makefile:185: superlu.o] Error 1

See test log for details:
  /home/vanessa/.spack/test/a3ovgo5kf4aqeurc3gvruduoiwot63qf/superlu-5.3.0-glyckr7-test-out.txt

==> Error: 1 test(s) in the suite failed.
```
title: spack test run superlu fails (possibly missing library slu_ddefs.h)
